name: DarkBox - Drive Dark Theme (Mar 2018)
description:
Google Drive with the lights turned off. Contrasting fonts and buttons in keeping with the Google design and darkened to match DarkBox - G-Drive by Google.

~CHECK OUT MY OTHER STYLES HERE~
The DarkBox suite currently includes
Inbox Dark Theme ~ Turn Google Inbox Dark!
GMelius Dark Theme ~ Turn GMelius for Inbox Dark!
Inbox Nav Mod ~ Inbox Wide & Compact Nav Panel

NEW Google Drive Theme ~ DarkBox for G-Drive

If your using an extension that does not work with DarkBox, leave feedback and I will address this.

Feedback is welcomed!
